column1: When we arrived at the wharf
column2: there were three of our number who assumed an authority to direct our operations
column3: to which we readily submitted. They divided us into three parties
column4: for the purpose of boarding the three ships which contained the tea at the same time. The name of him who commanded the division to which I was assigned was Leonard Pitt. The names of the other commanders I never knew.We were immediately ordered by the respective commanders to board all the ships at the same time
column5: which we promptly obeyed. The commander of the division to which I belonged
column6: as soon as we were on board the ship appointed me boatswain
column7: and ordered me to go to the captain and demand of him the keys to the hatches and a dozen candles. I made the demand accordingly
column9: and delivered the articles; but requested me at the same time to do no damage to the ship or rigging.
